snippet: Officials at the Knight Capital Group told customers that it had financing lined up for the day, according to people with knowledge of the matter. But many trading clients are still staying away.
abstract: Officials at the Knight Capital Group told customers that it had financing lined up for the day, according to people with knowledge of the matter. But many trading clients are still staying away.

byline.original: By MICHAEL J. DE LA MERCED

headline.main: Knight Rises, but Many Customers Fail to Return
